Changes.LogName: NPC Manifestation - Dwarf doesn't appear until can talk to them or Jasper is found in mines
NPC Gift Tastes - Dwarf loves milk

Entries.GiftReaction_Milk: Ah, delicious! A fine vintage, yes?
Entries.GiftReaction_Large_Milk: This cow juice certainly hits the spot.

Entries.Mon2: It's weird what people leave lying around. I don't know what most of it's for, but... do you like my collection?
Entries.summer_Mon4: The sun is no friend to my kind, sundweller. His gaze burns our skin.
Entries.Mon6: Sometimes I dream of the sky. How high do you think it goes, friend?
Entries.winter_Mon8: It wasn't just your skill at mining that proved you trustworthy, friend. The Mother thinks highly of you.
Entries.Mon10: My people are gone. Lost. What if I'm the last?
Entries.Tue2: Finest bombs this side of the Cascade Mountains. They'll make all the rocks go boom!
Entries.summer_Tue4: The earth is our Mother and our guardian, sundweller. I feel safest in her embrace.
Entries.Tue6: My sires told stories of the shadowfolk. Scary stories that kept sleep away.#$b#I can feel them here, deep in the mines: Broken, lost, and filled with anger.
Entries.winter_Tue8: We didn't mean to hurt the shadowfolk and blow open their home.#$b#It was an accident! A terrible, horrible accident.
Entries.Tue10: Do you think the shadow-person in the stinky-underdark gets lonely too?#$b#He doesn't seem angry, like the other ones, the ones below.
Entries.Wed2: Pretty dangerous place, these mines. You're gonna need some supplies. I've got bombs and I've got lollipops. Best kind. Candied cave carrot!
Entries.summer_Wed4: The warrior came snooping around last night, smelling of death and sorrow.#$b#I hid from him, sundweller, for I am not brave - and there was blood on his blade.
Entries.winter_Wed8: I find things in the mines that make me think of my people. It makes me sad.#$b#Where are my kin, friend?
Entries.Wed10: Have you ever heard or seen any more of my kin, friend? If you find any sign... you'd tell me, wouldn't you?
Entries.Thu6: My sibling fell in love with the sun; it burned their eyes. Remember friend, the sun cannot be trusted.
Entries.Thu8: Sometimes at night I wander through town. Humans have the weirdest stuff.#$b#And they just leave it lying around like it doesn't matter.
Entries.Thu10: The human with the silly hat keeps watch. I don't think he trusts me.#$b#You trust me, don't you friend?
Entries.Fri4: My sire taught me bombcraft. Do you know the tricks?#$b#Ah, but why make them yourself, when you can buy them from me!
Entries.Fri6: I had a name, but I hid it so no-one could hurt me.#$b#Names are powerful, friend, be careful who you trust with yours.
Entries.fall_Fri8: Sometimes when it rains, I sneak out to listen to her play, the female with the amethyst hair.#$b#There is magic in her music.. it makes me remember home.
Entries.Fri10: I'll tell you a secret, friend. I made this shop for you. Who else is gonna buy my stuff?
Entries.Sat4: The mines can be treacherous. Be careful, sundweller.#$b#My wares will help you stay alive.
Entries.Sat8: I came from mountains far away. Escaped from... No, you don't need to hear my sad story!#$b#The valley called me home. The end.
Entries.Sat10: The Elemental Wars were terrible. My sire told stories about the carnage.#$b#They made sure I remember.
Entries.Sun: $1 Dwarf_Milk#One day you'll have to tell me about this beverage you call "milk".$k#$e#Human food intrigues me. Is it true you drain the juices from other animals to drink?
Entries.Sun8: That human with the wire-frame eyes, the one that smells of metal and oil. I watch her stare at the stars.#$b#Sire said we came from the stars. I'm not sure I believe him.
Entries.Sun10: You're a good friend. I'm glad I trusted you.
Entries.summer_Mon10: I think one day, yes, I will trust you with my true name.#$b#But that day is... not today, friend.
Entries.summer_Tue_8: Do you hear the song of the earth, friend? No, of course you don't. Human ears aren't very good.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Jasper: I hope your mate isn't telling all of our secrets, no?
Entries.DwarfVisit: I'm not ready to return them yet... okay?
Entries.JasperHome1: I hope your friend's okay. But please keep our secret.#$b#Humans fear what they don't understand and destroy what they fear.
Entries.JasperHomeA: Thanks for keeping me secret, friend. Maybe one day I'll talk to your friend... but I've gotta decide if he can be trusted first. Okay?

Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Jasper: Your mate has some most outrageous ideas, friend.#$b#But there is insight too, when you listen between the lines
Entries.summer_Fri_inlaw_Jasper: Your mate uses a great many words I don't understand, friend.#$b#What does {{random: preposterous, terraformation, subcutaneous, metamorphic, thesaurus}} mean?
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Jasper: Humans are a strange species, @. Why does your mate use so many words to say the same thing?
Entries.spring_Fri_inlaw_Jasper: Greetings friend! Pleased you could join us. How goes your mining?
